ygData.subject: Re: New patch Tuesday, who hates us at Verant?
ygData.msgSnippet: They still stack for me.  Either Guardian and Purifying, or Guardian and Elemental.  I have not tried Purifying and Elemental.
ygData.messageBody:
They still stack for me. Either Guardian and Purifying, or Guardian and
Elemental. I have not tried Purifying and Elemental.


John Kim wrote:

> From: John Kim <kim@...>
>
> On Fri, 18 Jun 1999 jhenders@... wrote:
> >
> > Try Elemental and Purifying. They used to stack and were very handy in
> > Mistmoore.
>
> Are you sure? I've never been able to get Elemental and
> Purifying Ehythms to stack, and I first tried it way back in
> April, right after I got Purifying Rhythms.
>
> --
> John H. Kim
> kim@...
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Got an opinion?

> Make it count! Sign up for the ONElist Weekly Survey now.
